This template demonstrates how to use camera feeds in your experience, opening up possibilities for augmented reality and AI-driven applications.

<b>On Desktop:</b> The scene uses a simulated virtual camera. You can also toggle your webcam for creative effects.\
<b>In XR:</b> The app requests access to the device's world-facing camera to create a passthrough AR effect.

import { DocsIFrame } from '../DocsIFrame.jsx';
import { DocsSource } from '../DocsSource.jsx';

<DocsIFrame template="5_camera"></DocsIFrame>
<DocsSource template="5_camera"></DocsSource>
